name: Way of Boy
storyline: The game will take place in the so-called "Alternative Russia", in which the "boy" group, called the "Army AK44", declared war on the current "police" regime and won. As a result, they gained new power in their hometown. But the echoes of the "old regime" still make themselves felt. This was an "informal" guy who wanted to get into the AK44 Army and get rid of the past of his city.
summary: Way of Boy is a 2D action-adventure with elements of platformer and shooter. You are free to choose and imagine what your boy's path will be like as he regains power of his old hometown while echoes of the old regime remain...
